forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the sky bears a blend of clouds, softening the fading daylight into a gentle twilight. The temperature lingers around the mild 55 degrees, a reminder of the cool breath of the west-southwest winds that rustle through the streets. With gusts reaching up to 25 mph, there’s a playful energy in the air, an invitation from the city to embrace its dynamic essence. The remnants of the day retreat gently, yet the apparent clarity of the air hints at a fleeting whisper of fog, a light marine layer that may lend a touch of mystique to the evening.

Tomorrow promises a partly sunny disposition, with temperatures peaking near 64 before gradually descending. The afternoon might bring a tempered coolness, which demands a thoughtful approach to attire; layers become your trusted allies. A light sweater, perhaps, paired with comfortable jeans seems ideal for those venturing out to admire the golden hues of sunset or savor a meal at one of the beloved cafés nearby. The lively winds usher in a spirit of adventure; whether you find yourself wandering the waterfront or simply enjoying a quiet moment in one of the city's tranquil parks, the conditions beckon you to revel in the simple pleasures of a summer evening in San Francisco.
